about_the_game:
A police officer receives an emergency call from a remote mountain town, and soon he will realize the dark secret that is hidden behind this town. You will have to advance through an atmosphere where you will only hear the sound of rain, wind and whispers of beings who are no longer human.

Dangers

You will have to use your skills as a shooter to make your way through this town because along the way you will face enemies that will challenge your nerves.

Survival

You will need to explore as much as you can since a medical kit, or one more cartridge of ammunition, will be the difference between staying alive or dying in the attempt.

Key features

  • A mix of elements of action, stealth, horror, survival and in a dark rural horror setting.

  • The particular atmosphere of loneliness in a dangerous place where time has stopped forever.

  • Artistic direction that plays with the perspective of video and bodycam footage, of a policeman.

  • Deadly Combat and Stealth You'll need to decide when to use stealth when up against a lot of enemies and when to use brute force.

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4430 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 6GB or better
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400/AMD Ryzen 5 2600X
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2080 SUPER or better
  • DirectX: Version 12

  • VR Support: No

short_description: Enter this first-person shooter with dark and realistic scenarios, use your shooting skills to kill all the enemies and survive. Explore the scenario and collect all the resources you can because you will need them to get out alive.
